name: Battle of Heroes 3: Defense of the Kingdom
name_original: Battle of Heroes 3: Defense of the Kingdom
description:
Fantasy adventure. Start the game with an ordinary hero under the control of which there are several warriors and a small dragon. The choice of the hero depends on his skills and the composition of the warriors. There are three factions in the game, Humans, Undead, Chaos.  Factions are waging wars among themselves in the arena and in the global world. Capture all the kingdoms on the global map, face off against epic bosses.    

Choose development options, restrain waves of enemies, explore the dungeon, go on adventures or just help the villagers solve their problems. Develop the hero and his warriors, learn skills, buy uniforms, craft items, hire epic warriors, build towers and get resources.

I listen to the players and develop the fantasy world. Take part in creating a decent game.  

The game is localized into languages.

English.

Russian.

German.

French.

Portuguese.

Spanish.

Chinese.

Turkish.

Arabian.

Vietnamese.
